text: Sandaruwan Rodrigo (born 1 June 1997) is a Sri Lankan cricketer. He made his Twenty20 debut for Negombo Cricket Club in the 2017–18 SLC Twenty20 Tournament on 1 March 2018. He made his List A debut for Negombo Cricket Club in the 2017–18 Premier Limited Overs Tournament on 18 March 2018. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Sri Lankan cricketers Category:Negombo Cricket Club cricketers Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Sandaruwan Rodrigo
